name: Perfect Murder
description:
Thank's to the successful Kickstarter campaign, here comes Perfect Murder on Steam !



Kurokuro, a 17 years old student from a japanese highschool has committed a crime. Indeed, she has killed someone. The victim, being missing will cause the young girl to get into some dirty or conceptious situations whether at her school or on her everyday life, especially with the Police and the Detective hired by the victim's family.
You are going to play as this girl, or more precisely, her counciousness. in order to choose your own path; help kurokuro get away with her vicious crimes, help the police and reveal everything you've done or simply try to get into some funny and awkward situations, THE CHOICE IS IN YOUR HAND. Have fun and good luck trying to pull off this Perfect Murder.



  • Multiple routes, differents endings
  • Replayability
  • 6 to 8 hours of gameplay
  • Minigames to hide/discover things
  • Steam Achievements



You play Kurokuro, a 17 years old sophomore japanese student who isn't like any other girl. She is a strong and competitive girl, and this is maybe why she doesn't have that many friends, not even a single one. Until this faithful day when she screwed things up by committing a horrible crime.
